com.faltro.houdoku.model

Class Series

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.model.Series

  • public class Series
extends java.lang.Object
    A series from a ContentSource, which contains an array of Chapter's that the user can read from.

      • setMetadata

        private void setMetadata(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> metadata)
        Sets the "metadata" content of this object.

        The following fields are stored: language (String), author (String) artist (String), status (String) altNames (String[]), description (String) views (int), follows (int) rating (double), ratings (int) genres (String[])

        Parameters:
        metadata - a HashMap where keys are the field names listed above as Strings and values of the matching type

      • getChapters

        public java.util.ArrayList<Chapter> getChapters()

      • setChapters

        public void setChapters(java.util.ArrayList<Chapter> chapters)
        Sets the chapters field using a provided ArrayList.

        Since many series have multiple scanlations, the number of chapters in the ArrayList will often exceed the number of "actual" chapters that a series has. This is because a Chapter object is used for each individual release, even if multiple may actually refer to the same "real chapter."

        The ArrayList is sorted by descending chapter number. This function will also set numHighestChapter (effectively the predicted "most recent real chapter") by getting the chapterNum of the first chapter in the sorted list. If this series does not have any chapters, numHighestChapter is simply set to 0.

        Parameters:
        chapters - an ArrayList of Chapter's
